title: Michelle Obama, BET Awards, Carla's Reality Update, Sheryl Underwood and more.
itunes:title: Michelle Obama, BET Awards, Carla's Reality Update, Sheryl Underwood and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is singing quarantine jams. The BET Awards are going virtual this year. Tommy does a wellness check in South Carolina. Have your beliefs changed since COVID-19 hit? Sheryl Underwood was here to remind us to tune into The Talk. Miss Carla talks about the fighting on Real Housewives of Atlanta in Reality Update. Michelle Obama welcomed a very special guest to her YouTube channel on Monday. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about how WE are all trying to stay safe and points out the importance of a good mental attitude, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
